definitions.title: pl.
definitions.body: internal organs, inward parts (intestines, bowels), belly (NH id.; Aram. [[מְעָא]], [[מַעֲיׇא]], m9e0, m9ayo0; Ar. ma\i9any; Eth. 0mi9ut:;—on form cf. Lag:BN 156 Ba:ZMG xiii. 1888, 345);—pl. [[[מֵעִים]]] cstr. [[מְעֵי]] Ps 71:6 + 3 t.; sf. [[מֵעַי]] 2Sa 16:11 + 9 t., [[מֵעָָי]] Ps 22:15, Ps 40:9; [[מֵעֶיְ]] Ge 15:4 + 6 t.; [[מֵעַיִח]] Ge 25:23, Nu 5:22; [[מֵעָיו]] 2Sa 20:10 + 5 t.; [[מֵעֵיהֶם]] Ez Eze 7:19; —

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[וַיִּשְׁפּׂח מֵעָיו אַ֫רְחָה]] 2Sa 20:10 and he poured out his inward parts on the ground (through a wound); cf. ´[[מַחֲלֵה מ]] 2Ch 21:15, 2Ch 21:18, ´[[יָֽחְאוּ מ]] v:2Ch 21:15, v:2Ch 21:19.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: as digestive organs, but without precision, nearly = stomach, belly, Job 20:14; Ez Eze 3:3 (‖[[בֶּטֶן]]), Eze 7:19 (‖[[נֶפֶשׁ]]; both c. [[מָלֵא]]), Nu 5:22; so of fish that swallowed Jonah Jon 2:1, Jon 2:2.
source of procreation: [[אשׁר יחא]] ´[[מִמּ]] (said of offspring) Ge 15:4 (JE), 2Sa 7:12 (‖[[זַרְעְֲ]]), 2Sa 16:11; ´[[חֶאֱחָאֵי מ]] Is 48:19 (‖ id.); ´[[מִיחִיאֵי מ]] 2Ch 32:21.
in gen. = inwards, inward part, ´[[נׇמֵס בְּתוֹח מ]] …[[לִבִּי ]] Ps 22:15, cf. ´[[תּוֹרָֽתְ ְבְּתוֹח מ]] Ps 40:9.

fig. = seat of emotions: pity, Is 16:11 (‖[[קֶרֶב]]); of God's compassion, Je 31:20 (‖[[רחם]]; in both subj. of vb. [[הָמוּ]]); [[הֲמוֹן מֵעֶיְ]] Is 63:15 (‖[[רַחֲמֶיְ]]); distress, Je 4:19, Je 4:19 (‖[[לֵב]], [[מֵעַי חֳמַרְמָרוּ]] La 1:20 (‖[[לֵב]]), La 2:11 (‖[[כָּבֵד]] liver); [[מֵעַי רֻתְּחוּ]] Job 30:27 (dub., v. Bu); love, [[מֵעַי הָמוּ עָלָיו]] Ct So 5:4.
the external belly, [[מֵעָיו עֶשֶׁת שֵׁן]] Ct So 5:14.
